speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the interim report by Mrs Wallis, on behalf of the Committee of Inquiry into the crisis of the Equitable Life Assurance Society, on the crisis of the Equitable Life Assurance Society [ 2006/2026(INI) ( A6-0221/2006 ).
original: President. The next item is the interim report by Mrs Wallis, on behalf of the Committee of Inquiry into the crisis of the Equitable Life Assurance Society, on the crisis of the Equitable Life Assurance Society [ 2006/2026(INI) ( A6-0221/2006 ).
